title: Retirement Advisor: Coronavirus Considerations
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: CNBC ran an article a week ago arguing that the coronavirus should make people rethink the idea of retiring abroad based on the quality of overseas healthcare and the inability to get Medicare coverage. This podcast (6:31) suggests these two arguments are fairly easy to overcome, but that the true coronavirus critique of retirement abroad is that in the social distancing caused by this pandemic, many a family are drawing closer than ever before, something that international borders would block. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
